text: Tí ó bá jẹ́ pé n̄ǹkan ìgbádùn (ọrọ̀ ogun) àrọ́wótó àti ìrìn-àjò tí kò jìnnà (l’o pè wọ́n sí ni), wọn ìbá tẹ̀lé ọ. Ṣùgbọ́n ìrìn-àjò ogun Tabūk jìnnà lójú wọn. Wọ́n yó sì máa fi Allāhu búra pé: “Tí ó bá jẹ́ pé a lágbára ni, àwa ìbá jáde (fún ogun ẹ̀sìn) pẹ̀lú yín.” – Wọ́n sì ń kó ìparun bá ẹ̀mí ara wọn (nípa ṣíṣe ìṣọ̀bẹ-ṣèlu.) – Allāhu sì mọ̀ pé dájúdájú òpùrọ́ ni wọn
